## Learning Resources

- [Caching Data with Spring](https://spring.io/guides/gs/caching/)

- [Spring Data Redis](https://docs.spring.io/spring-data/redis/docs/2.1.9.RELEASE/reference/html/)
- [Next Level Redis with Spring](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VvK-uLWDHFo)
- [Enabling Redis cache in spring boot](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/41647382/enabling-redis-cache-in-spring-boot)
